data.name: How many orders can be delivered?
data.description:
You own a delivery company. Different couriers work in different areas.

Having a number of free couriers available and a number of orders, you want to know how many of them can be delivered.

You will need to implement *deliver* function

```javascript
function deliver(couriers, orders, canDeliver)
```

where

* couriers   - the number of couriers currently available
* orders     - the number of orders that need to be delivered
* canDeliver - which courier can deliver which order. Array of arrays of 2 numbers - courier index and order index

For example

```javascript
deliver(3, 3, [[1,1],[1,2],[2,1],[3,2],[3,3]]) -> 3
```

Result is 3 - give the 1st order to the 2nd courier, the 2nd to the 1st and the 3rd to the 3rd.
